title: 01/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Stop blaming everyone but Aaron Rodgers. 

-The Chiefs play like an NBA dynasty

-Aaron Rodgers is being needlessly passive aggressive about his future

-Kicking a field goal was a bad decision but not why the Packers lost

-Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guest: Jimmy Johnson, 2x Super Bowl Champion & NFL on FOX

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
